src:
Demo Ricuh di Irak Kembali Telan Korban: 4 Pendemo dan 1 Aparat Tewas
05 Nov 2019, 01:15 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - Demonstrasi besar-besaran mengakibatkan lima orang tewas di Baghdad, Irak. Korban terdiri dari empat orang pendemo dan satu orang aparat keamanan.
Dilansir dari AP, Senin (4/11/2019), terdapat pula 60 korban terluka pada waktu setempat. Para demonstran sempat menyeberangi jembatan utama dan mendekati gedung pemerintahan.
Pendemo sendiri memprotes meningkatnya korupsi, tingginya angka pengangguran dan rendahnya pelayanan publik. Aparat keamanan sudah bertindak represif yang mengakibatkan 250 orang tewas.
Sementara itu, puluhan pendemo juga menyerang konsulat Iran di kota suci penganut Syiah, Karbala, Minggu (3/11). Pendemo menurunkan bendera Iran, dan menggantinya dengan bendera Irak.
Aparat keamanan melakukan tembakan peringatan untuk membubarkan massa. Belum ada laporan mengenai korban akibat kerusuhan itu.
text:
Ricuh Demo in Iraq Swallow Victims: 4 Demonstrators and 1 Death Apparatus
05 Nov 2019, 01:15 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - Large-scale demonstrations resulted in five people killed in Baghdad, Iraq. The victims consisted of four demonstrators and one security officer.
Reporting from the AP on Monday (11/04/2019), there were also 60 victims injured at the local time. The demonstrators crossed the main bridge and approached the government building.
The demonstrators themselves protested against increased corruption, high unemployment and low public services. The security forces have acted repressively, resulting in 250 deaths.
Meanwhile, dozens of protesters also attacked the Iranian consulate in the Shiite holy city of Karbala on Sunday (3/11). The protesters took down the Iranian flag, and replaced it with the Iraqi flag.
Security forces fired warning shots to disperse the crowd. There have been no reports of casualties from the riots.
